description.full: Worst of friends. Best of enemies. Agents Graves and Lang must track a deadly cargo across three continents to prevent it falling into the hands of a vicious dictator. That's if they don't kill each other first.....  Learn more at www.conflictdeniedops.com and www.pivotalgames.com.  Tactical FPS / Single player / 2-player Online & Split-screen Co-op / 4-player Split-screen Multiplayer / 16-player Online Multiplayer.
